job.title: Solutions Engineer - Enterprise Software, Microsoft Azure, DAC
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
If you are a Solutions Engineer with experience in the education industry, please read on!
We are a quickly growing education based software company looking to add a Solutions Engineer to our team! The ideal candidate would possess enterprise software experience, at least 5 years of technical experience (preferably in One Card or Commerce (POS) ), and an understanding of enterprise-class systems, design, and architecture.
What You Will Be Doing
Serve as a subject matter expert focusing on POS Suite
Engage in strategic conversations regarding product capabilities and benefits with customers and prospects
Conduct periodic internal training sessions to keep the Sales/Business Development team updated on new product features and functions
Develop proposals, both written and oral, for client-focused solutions
Provide information and recommendations to assist with the development of responses to RFPs/RFIs.
Setup product demonstration and evaluation environments and oversee the evaluation process
Assist development teams in writing and updating of API documentation and integration guides in the Developer Portal
Configure the API Gateway for onboarding of external and internal applications
Assist in developing and supervising an API Certification program
Expect travel to be 40-50%.
What You Need for this Position
Enterprise Software
Microsoft Azure
DAC
Microsoft Excel
RBAC
Microsoft Outlook
One Card
oAuth flows
Commerce (POS)
Identity and Access Tokens
What's In It for You
Competitive salary
Full benefits offered
Endless growth potential
Great leadership
Passionate team members
We are actively interviewing for this role, so please APPLY TODAY!
